sentences.english: She extends a helping hand to the poor and opens her arms to the needy.
sentences.chinese: 她张手赒济困苦人，伸手帮助穷乏人。

sentences.english: Therefore hear now this, thou afflicted, and drunken, but not with wine
sentences.chinese: 因此，你这困苦却非因酒而醉的，要听我言。

sentences.english: Sanitation Construction in Beibei was operated in quite hard conditions.
sentences.chinese: 北碚的卫生建设是在极其困苦的条件下开展的。

sentences.english: They are pretty confident because they never felt hardship.
sentences.chinese: 他们都很自信因为他们没有感受过困苦。

sentences.english: Then they cried to the Lord in anguish, and he rescued them from their distress.
sentences.chinese: 他们于急难中一哀求上主，上主即拯救他们脱离困苦。

sentences.english: I know that the Lord secures justice for the poor and upholds the cause of the needy.
sentences.chinese: 我知道耶和华必为困苦人伸冤，必为穷乏人辨屈。

sentences.english: The love and care you have given us will encourage us to go through a long and arduous journey.
sentences.chinese: 您给以我们的爱和眷注将激昂着我们走过艰巨困苦。

sentences.english: But a strong man would bear hardship without complaining.
sentences.chinese: 但一个坚强的男人是会忍受困苦而不抱怨的。

sentences.english: She opens her arms to the poor and extends her hands to the needy.
sentences.chinese: 她张手周济困苦人，伸手帮补穷乏人。

sentences.english: This poor man called, and the Lord heard him; he saved him out of all his troubles.
sentences.chinese: 我这困苦人呼求，耶和华便垂听，救我脱离一切患难。

sentences.english: In other words, don't take the problems and troubles in this life tooseriously.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，不要把今生的困苦和患难看得过重。

sentences.english: He together is poor who does not possess knowledge.
The brave soldiers did their duty, careless of dangers and discomforts .
sentences.chinese: 勇敢的士兵尽忠职守，对危险和困苦毫不在乎。

sentences.english: People were fighting like gamecocks against adversity.
sentences.chinese: 一直都象斗鸡一样地和艰难困苦奋斗的人。

sentences.english: This poor man cried, and the LORD heard him, and saved him out of all his troubles.
sentences.chinese: 我这困苦人呼求，耶和华便垂听，救我脱离一切患难。

sentences.english: Lest they drink, and forget the law, and pervert the judgment of any of the afflicted.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕喝了就忘记律例，颠倒一切困苦人的是非。

definition: lit. food not filling the stomach (idiom)/fig. poverty-stricken
destitute and homeless (idiom); displaced and without means
beset by hunger and cold (idiom)/starving and freezing/in desperate poverty
homeless and miserable (idiom); to wander about in a desperate plight/to drift
